Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the cancellation of a health club contract
Summary: Requires health club contracts to allow a buyer to cancel with thirty days' notice; allows a buyer to submit a notice of cancellation by electronic mail in addition to in person, by phone or by mail; requires a health club to accept notice of cancellation via website if such contract was entered into via website; and decreases the time necessary for a disability cancellation from six months to three months.
LawCode: Amd ยง624, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the cancellation of a health club contract
